text.div: eHealth Ontario OLIS Provider Query FHIR Capability Statement

name: Ontario Laboratories Information System FHIR Capability Statement
title: Ontario Laboratories Information System FHIR Capability Statement
description: This is the FHIR capability statement for Ontario Laboratories Information System (OLIS) server-Provider
purpose: Main EHR capability statement, published for contracting and operational support

rest.documentation: Support retrieval of patient's laboratory records, or retrieve all lab results for certain category

security.description: JWT. Please refer to Ontario JWT Guide.

resource.documentation: Retrieve history of patient's lab results

interaction.documentation: Search DiagnosticReport resources using specified parameters. For 1.0.0 OLIS supports only GET operation

searchParam.name: patient.identifier
searchParam.documentation: Only supports search by Ontario Health Card Number- mandatory for OLIS patient query, not supported for bulk query

searchParam.name: patient.gender
searchParam.documentation: Patient gender- mandatory for OLIS patient query, not supported for bulk query

searchParam.name: patient.birthDate
searchParam.documentation: Patient date of birth - mandatory for OLIS patient query, not supported for bulk query

searchParam.name: issued
searchParam.documentation: Start date of the search criteria, the date can either be the date  that OLIS recieves the report (issued), or the date that the test was performed (specimen.collected). Mandatory for bulk query

searchParam.name: specimen.collected
searchParam.documentation: Start date of the search criteria, the date can either be the date  that OLIS recieves the report (issued), or the date that the test was performed (specimen.collected). Not supported for bulk query

searchParam.name: result.based-on:ProcedureRequest.code
searchParam.documentation: Test request status code- optional. Not supported for bulk query

searchParam.name: result.interpretation
searchParam.documentation: Abnormal results- optional. Not supported for bulk query

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Diagnostic report identifier- optional. Not supported for bulk query

searchParam.name: result.code
searchParam.documentation: Test result code- optional. Not supported for bulk query
